sources.description:
When illiterate coal miner Jesse Hallam uproots his life from Kentucky to Cincinnati for his daughter's critical surgery, he faces unexpected hurdles in the city, notably his inability to read. Determined to provide for his family, he sells their farm and embarks on a brave quest to learn to read, write, and ultimately graduate from high school, all to secure his daughter's well-being.

Original title: The Pride of Jesse Hallam (1981)


This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Gary Nelson
Writer: Suzanne Clauser
Stars: Johnny Cash, Brenda Vaccaro, Ben Marley, Eli Wallach
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Drama
